Util::Warning Class Reference

Stream-like class to print a warning message to the app's console window. More...

virtual ~Warning ()

Detailed Description

Stream-like class to print a warning message to the app's console window.

Example: 

        Warning() << "This is a warning message..."; // would print a warning message to the console window
